moreBlocks.lawyersAtPeterThompson&AssociatesSelecte: • Thompson, Peter On a Super Lawyers® List

description:
Voted Bangor’s “Best Personal Injury Lawyers” 10 years in a row.

Peter Thompson & Associates’ award winning attorneys have over 60 years combined experience in personal injury and wrongful death law and over 100 courtroom victories. Last year alone we recovered over $15,000,000 for our clients and were awarded U.S. News & World Report’s “Best Law Firms” rating.
While outstanding results and national recognition are important to us, even more important is the positive feedback we receive from our clients. Peter Thompson & Associates was rated 4.9 out of 5 stars for “overall satisfaction” and “responsiveness” with 100 percent of our clients stating they “would recommend” our firm to others. At Peter Thompson & Associates, every client matters.

Serving all of Penobscot County and the surrounding areas from our law office in Bangor, Maine, the attorneys at Peter Thompson & Associates are fully prepared to help you secure the maximum amount of compensation for the damages you incurred as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

Experienced, Award-Winning Counsel

Staffed by a team of award-winning trial attorneys, our law firm has become the trusted source for exceptional legal counsel and aggressive advocacy for those who suffered an injury or lost a loved one due to a motor vehicle accident, medical malpractice, nursing home abuse, a defective product, a slip-and-fall accident or any other type of preventable tragedy. Attorney Thompson is “AV Preeminent” rated by Martindale-Hubbell and is listed is listed in U.S. News & World Report’s “Best Lawyers in America”. New England Super Lawyers magazine designated him as a “Super Lawyer,” an honor awarded to the top 5% of lawyers in New England.

The Best In The Profession On Your Side

To find out more about how the dedicated legal professionals at Peter Thompson & Associates can best serve your needs, you can contact our law office to receive a free initial consultation concerning your claim.
